info.name: BeSmart Mobile App API
info.description:
Complete API collection for BeSmart Mobile Application (Flutter).
This contains EVERY API the mobile app calls through the Django backend.

**Setup:**
1. Set `base_url` to your Django server (default: http://localhost:8000)
2. Run **01. Auth > Login** first — the token is auto-saved to `{{token}}`
3. Most endpoints auto-save IDs (product_id, order_id, etc.) from responses

**Total APIs: 121 endpoints across 25 feature areas**

**Authentication:** All authenticated endpoints use Bearer token in Authorization header.
The mobile app gets this token from Supabase Auth, then sends it to Django which validates it.

item.name: 01. Auth (6 endpoints)
item.description:
User authentication — register, login, logout, password management, account deletion.
Run Login first to get the Bearer token.

request.description: Register a new user account. Returns user object + session with access_token.
Login user. Auto-saves Bearer token to {{token}}.
Logout and invalidate the current session.
Send password reset email to the user.
Change password for logged-in user.
Check if the user's account can be deleted (not an active vendor, no pending orders).
Permanently delete user account. Requires password confirmation.

item.name: 02. User Profile (2 endpoints)
item.description: Get and update the current user's profile.

request.description: Get the logged-in user's profile (id, email, full_name, phone, avatar_url, etc.).
Update profile fields (full_name, phone, avatar_url).

item.name: 03. Products (14 endpoints)
item.description: Product listing, detail, search, PDP enhancements, reviews, Q&A.

request.description: List products with filtering (category, brand, price range, sale), search, and ordering.
Get full product details (name, price, images, sizes, colors, rating, vendor_id, etc.).
Get featured products list.
Get new arrival products.
Get products currently on sale.
Search products by text (name, description, brand).
Track when a user views a product (analytics).
Get size chart template for a product.
Get published reviews for a product (includes summary with avg rating and histogram).
Submit a review for a product (one per user per product).
Get questions & answers for a product.
Ask a question about a product.
Mark a Q&A as helpful (increment count).
Mark a review as helpful.
Report an inappropriate review.

item.name: 04. Enhanced PDP (8 endpoints)
item.description:
Product Detail Page enhancements — delivery, warranty, offers, highlights, specs, posters, recommendations, reviews summary.
All public (no auth required). Called when user opens a product detail page.

request.description: Delivery info: ETA, COD eligible, free delivery, shipping fee, return window.
Warranty: type, duration, description, coverage details, exclusions.
Active offers/coupons for this product.
Product highlights / key selling points (label + icon).
Feature poster media (title, subtitle, media_url, CTA).
Product specifications grouped by category (group_name → rows of name:value).
Similar products, from-seller products, you-might-also-like. Falls back to same-category products.
Aggregated: average_rating, total_reviews, with_media count, histogram [1-5 star counts].

item.name: 05. Categories (3 endpoints)
item.description: Browse categories and subcategories.

request.description: Get all active categories.
Get subcategories for a category.
Get products in a category.

item.name: 06. Cart (6 endpoints)
item.description: Shopping cart — view, add, update, remove, clear, summary.

request.description: Get user's cart with all items (includes product details).
Get cart totals: subtotal, item count, etc.
Add item to cart. If same product+size+color exists, quantity is incremented.
Update cart item quantity.
Remove an item from cart.
Remove all items from the cart.

item.name: 07. Wishlist (3 endpoints)
item.description: Wishlist — add, remove, list.

request.description: List all wishlist items with product details.
Add a product to wishlist.
Remove a product from wishlist.
Move a wishlist item to the cart.
Clear entire wishlist.

item.name: 08. Shipping Addresses (5 endpoints)
item.description: Manage shipping addresses for checkout.

request.description: Get all shipping addresses for the user.
Create a new shipping address.
Update a shipping address.
Delete a shipping address.
Set an address as the default shipping address.

item.name: 09. Orders (6 endpoints)
item.description: Place, view, track, cancel, reorder, and get invoice.

request.description: List all orders for the current user (with items and product details).
Create order from cart. Supports voucher_code for loyalty discounts.
Get full order details including items, status history, payment info.
Get order tracking timeline (status history with timestamps).
Cancel a pending order.
Re-add items from a previous order to the cart.
Get invoice data for an order (JSON).

item.name: 10. Payments (4 endpoints)
item.description: Payment initiation, verification, and payment method management.

request.description: Initiate a Squad payment. Returns checkout_url to open in WebView.
Verify a payment by Squad transaction reference.
List user's saved payment methods (cards).
Save a payment method for future use.

item.name: 11. Loyalty (10 endpoints)
item.description: Loyalty points, rewards, badges, vouchers, tier info.

request.description: Get user's loyalty points balance, tier, and multiplier.
List loyalty point transactions (earn/redeem history).
Get available rewards catalog.
Redeem a reward using loyalty points. Returns a voucher code.
Get user's redeemed vouchers.
Validate a voucher code against an order amount. Returns discount details.
Get all loyalty badges.
Get all badges with user's earned status.
Get progress toward earning each badge.
Get user's loyalty tier details and benefits.

item.name: 12. Vendors (8 endpoints)
item.description: Browse vendors, view products, follow/unfollow, reviews.

request.description: List approved, active vendors.
Get featured vendors.
Search vendors by business name.
Get vendor details (name, logo, rating, description, etc.).
List products from a specific vendor.
List reviews for a vendor.
Submit a review for a vendor.
Follow a vendor.
Unfollow a vendor.

item.name: 13. UJUNWA AI Chat (3 endpoints)
item.description:
AI Shopping Assistant — send messages, get product recommendations, track analytics.
The UJUNWA AI handles: intent recognition, product search (hybrid keyword + vector), FAQs, context-aware responses.

request.description:
Start a new conversation with UJUNWA AI.

Response includes:
- conversation_id (auto-saved)
- user_message object
- bot_response with: message_text, message_type (text/product), metadata (intent, suggestions, product_ids), products array
Continue an existing conversation. AI uses conversation context for better responses.
Track chat actions (product_clicked, message_sent, etc.) for analytics.

item.name: 14. Chat History (4 endpoints)
item.description: Manage chat conversations and messages.

request.description: List all chat conversations for the user.
Get a single conversation with all messages.
List messages in a conversation (paginated).
Delete a conversation and its messages.

item.name: 15. Image Search (1 endpoint)
item.description: Search products by uploading an image. Uses OpenAI Vision to analyze the image and find matching products.

request.description:
Upload an image → OpenAI Vision analyzes it → returns matching products.

Response: { description, products[], count }

item.name: 16. Currency (3 endpoints)
item.description: Currency rates and user preference.

request.description: Get active currency exchange rates.
Convert an amount between currencies.
GET: Get user's preferred currency. PUT: Update preference.

item.name: 17. Content & Support (5 endpoints)
item.description: Homepage content, banners, FAQs, contact info, support info, branches.

request.description: Get homepage hero banner content.
Get active promotional banners for homepage.
Get FAQs / support info entries.
Get company contact information.
Get physical store/branch locations.
Get support info entries (filterable by type: quick_help, contact, policy).

item.name: 18. Search Analytics (2 endpoints)
item.description: Track and retrieve search analytics.

request.description: Log a search event for analytics.
Get popular and recent searches.

item.name: 19. Chat Management (5 endpoints)
item.description: Chat history management — mark messages read, unread count, clear history, search messages, analytics retrieval.

request.description: Bulk mark messages as read by sender type (bot/agent) in a conversation. Clears the unread badge.
Get count of unread bot/agent messages across all conversations. Returns {unread_count: N}. Drives the chat icon badge.
Delete ALL chat data for the user: messages, conversations, analytics, context. Used by Settings > Privacy > Clear Chat History.
Full-text search across chat message history. Returns matching messages with conversation_id.
Retrieve chat analytics records with optional date range filter. The POST endpoint still works for tracking.

item.name: 20. Reviews & Q&A Enhancements (4 endpoints)
item.description: Additional review/Q&A operations. Existing GET reviews now supports ?rating=5&sort_by=rating&sort_order=desc&has_media=true. Existing GET Q&A now supports ?search=keyword&has_answer=true.

request.description: Check if user can review a product. Returns {can_review, has_existing_review, order_id}.
Same reviews endpoint with all filter options demonstrated.
Same Q&A endpoint with search and filter options demonstrated.
Vendor answers a customer question. Only the product vendor can answer.

item.name: 21. Vendor Enhancements (5 endpoints)
item.description: Follow status check, followed vendors list, followers list, user review for vendor, product size chart assignment. GET /vendors/{id}/ now includes follower_count.

request.description: Check if current user follows a vendor. Returns {is_following: true/false}.
List all vendors the current user follows.
Get follower count and list. Returns {count, followers: [{user_id, email, followed_at}]}.
Get current user review for a vendor. Returns {review: {...}} or {review: null}.
Vendor assigns a size chart template to their product.

item.name: 22. Payment Method Management (4 endpoints)
item.description: Retrieve, update, delete, and set default payment methods.

request.description: Retrieve a single payment method by ID.
Update a saved payment method.
Delete a payment method. If default, next card auto-promotes.
Set a payment method as default. Clears default on all others.

item.name: 23. Order Enhancements (2 endpoints)
item.description: Payment status update + general status update. Create Order now also accepts: squad_transaction_ref, squad_gateway_ref, payment_status, escrow_status, items[] array.

request.description: Update order payment status after Squad callback. Auto-confirms order if paid.
General order status update. Valid: pending, confirmed, processing, shipped, delivered, cancelled, refunded, returned.

item.name: 24. Category Size Charts (2 endpoints)
item.description: Size chart operations at the category level.

request.description: Get the approved size chart template for a category.
Boolean check: does this category have an approved size chart? Returns {has_size_chart: bool}.

item.name: 25. Currency Enhancement (1 endpoint)
item.description: Get direct exchange rate between two currencies.

request.description: Get effective exchange rate between two currencies. Returns {from_currency, to_currency, rate}.
